name: Get a contact's details
descriptionHtml: Along with the contact details, this endpoint will show the statistics of contact for the recent 90 days by default. To fetch the earlier statistics, please use Get contact campaign stats ``https://developers.sendinblue.com/reference/contacts-7#getcontactstats`` endpoint with the appropriate date ranges.
statusMessage: Email is in a valid format, ID is a non-negative integer, EmailBlacklisted and smsBlacklisted are boolean values

To fetch the earlier statistics, please use Get contact campaign stats ``https://developers.sendinblue.com/reference/contacts-7#getcontactstats`` endpoint with the appropriate date ranges.

EmailBlacklisted and smsBlacklisted are boolean values
